<h3>Shortcodes</h3>
<p>NextGEN Gallery offers an easy-to-use Insert Gallery Window, which means you never need to work with shortcodes again when inserting and manageing galleries &#8211; if you would prefer not too.</p>
<p>If you do want to work with shortcodes, there is a powerful shortcode system as you&#8217;d expect of a popular WordPress gallery plugin. <a href="https://www.imagely.com/docs/nextgen-gallery-shortcodes/" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn About NextGEN Gallery Shortcodes</a>.</p>
<p>For more information, feel free to visit the official website for the NextGEN Gallery <a href="https://www.imagely.com/wordpress-gallery-plugin/" rel="nofollow ugc">WordPress Gallery Plugin</a>.</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:1084:"<p>INSTALLATION: The easiest way to start uploading your photos is to login to you WordPress dashboard, go to Plugins &gt; Add New, search for NextGEN Gallery, and click to install the plugin. You can also download the plugin zip file from this page and upload it from the Plugins &gt; Add New &gt; Upload page.</p>
<p>HOW TO USE: Just go to a page or post and add a NextGEN Gallery block. Within the block, click the Add Gallery button to open our Insert Gallery Window, where you can create, manage, customize, and display your WordPress photo galleries. You can also manage your photo galleries and gallery settings from the central options area under the &#8220;Gallery&#8221; tab on your dashboard menu.</p>
<p>DOCUMENTATION: See <a href="https://www.imagely.com/docs/nextgen-gallery/" rel="nofollow ugc">NextGEN Gallery Documentation</a>.</p>
<p>That&#8217;s it &#8230; have fun! For more information, feel free to visit the official website for the NextGEN Gallery <a href="https://www.imagely.com/wordpress-gallery-plugin" rel="nofollow ugc">WordPress Gallery Plugin</a>.</p>
";s:3:"faq";s:4739:"
<dt id='why%20are%20my%20photo%20galleries%20not%20opening%20up%20in%20a%20lightbox%20after%20i%20move%20my%20site%3F'>
Why are my photo galleries not opening up in a lightbox after I move my site?
</h4>
<p>
<p>This is often due to the URL paths to the CSS and JavaScript files used by the Lightbox Effects not being changed to relevant addresses based on the new site. This article will help sort out this issue if that is the case: <a href="https://www.imagely.com/docs/galleries-opening-lightbox/" rel="nofollow ugc">Why are my galleries not opening up in a lightbox?</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='do%20you%20have%20documentation%20or%20tutorials%3F'>
Do you have documentation or tutorials?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. See <a href="https://www.imagely.com/docs/nextgen-gallery/" rel="nofollow ugc">NextGEN Gallery Documentation</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='will%20this%20gallery%20plugin%20work%20with%20my%20theme%3F'>
Will this gallery plugin work with my theme?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yup, NextGEN is a popular and well-established WordPress gallery plugin, and has been for a long time. It will work well with most other themes and plugins in the WordPress ecosystem.</p>
</p>
<dt id='are%20the%20photo%20galleries%20flash%20based%3F'>
Are the photo galleries flash based?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Nope, we use no flash elements.</p>
</p>
<dt id='are%20the%20galleries%20mobile%20friendly%3F'>
Are the galleries mobile friendly?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, we&#8217;ve put a lot of work into this and, NextGEN Galleries are compatible with phones and tablets, inluding Android and iOS operating systems. All photo galleries are also responsive, so galleries look good on diverse screen sizes. NextGEN Pro also includes a full screen, responsive Pro Lightbox with mobile gesture support. It&#8217;s great for viewing photos on mobile devices.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20is%20the%20difference%20between%20a%20gallery%20and%20an%20album%3F'>
What is the difference between a gallery and an album?
</h4>
<p>
<p>In simple terms, Albums are collections of galleries. So Galleries contain your photos and Albums contain your Galleries. Albums act as links and placeholders to quickly and easily navigate your galleries. Galleries will actually display your images.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20upload%20multiple%20images%20at%20once%3F'>
Can I upload multiple images at once?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, you can batch upload entire photo galleries at one time.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20password%20protect%20galleries%3F'>
Can I password protect galleries?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, WordPress allows you to password protect pages by default &#8211; which includes all photo galleries and content for the entire page. Password protection of pages can be turned on and off at any time, with just a few clicks.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20add%20a%20watermark%20to%20the%20my%20photos%3F'>
Can I add a watermark to the my photos?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, you can add text or image watermarks to your gallery images.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20crop%20photo%20thumbnails%3F'>
Can I crop photo thumbnails?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, each thumbnail image can be individually adjusted to suit your needs.</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20there%20pagination%20for%20photo%20galleries%3F'>
Is there pagination for photo galleries?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, you can use pagination when displaying thumbnail galleries. And you can adjust the amount of photos to be shown on a page at any time.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20customize%20the%20lightbox%3F'>
Can I customize the lightbox?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, the lightbox can be configured with multiple options directly from the Dashboard, and there are multiple CSS styles which can be applied and modified as well. If you want even more options, consider upgrading to NextGEN Pro and useing the NextGEN Pro lightbox.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20add%20html%20to%20photo%20captions%3F'>
Can I add HTML to photo captions?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, caption areas are fully HMTL capable.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20add%20an%20external%20links%20to%20galleries%3F'>
Can I add an external links to galleries?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Since the captions are fully HTML capable, you can add external links and any other type of mark up you wish.</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20nextgen%20gallery%20available%20in%20foreign%20languages%3F'>
Is NextGEN Gallery available in foreign languages?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, our WordPress gallery plugin has been translated into dozens of languages &#8211; <a href="https://www.imagely.com/languages/" rel="nofollow ugc">click here to find out more.</a></p>
</p>
<dt id='more%20information'>
More Information
</h4>
<p>
<p>For more information, feel free to visit the official website for the NextGEN Gallery <a href="https://www.imagely.com/wordpress-gallery-plugin" rel="nofollow ugc">WordPress Gallery Plugin</a>.</p>
</p>

* Changed: Updated uppy.js<br />
* Fixed:   Conflict with Avada builder<br />
* Fixed:   ACG fields cannot be toggled<br />
* Fixed:   Activation issues with NextGEN Starter</p>
<p>= V3.9.2 &#8211; 04.07.2021<br />
* Fixed:   call_user_func() warning when rendering shortcodes in widgets (1168)<br />
* Fixed:   do_shortcode and legacy shortcodes (1170)<br />
* Fixed:   Incorrect use of wp_localize_script (1171)<br />
* Fixed:   Tooltips are illegible (1172)<br />
* Fixed:   PHP foreach warning (1173)</p>
<h4>V3.9.1 &#8211; 03.29.2021</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed:   C_Dynamic_Stylesheet_Controller error</li>
<li>Fixed:   Galleries not displaying</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.9.0 &#8211; 03.24.2021</h4>
<ul>
<li>Changed: Resource manager disabled by default</li>
<li>Changed: Remove ngg_load_frontend_logic filter</li>
<li>Fixed:   Refactored to resolve over 300 plugin &amp; theme conflicts</li>
<li>Fixed:   Problem reported with taxonomy controller</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.8.0 &#8211; 02.24.2021</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     NGG featured image support for custom post types (1076)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with Custom Post Type UI plugin (1076)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with Advanced Custom Fields plugin (1150)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with Photo Station plugin (855)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with Stackable (981)</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.7.0 &#8211; 02.17.2021</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed:   Added ellipsis to pagination to show pages skipped (1099) (1157)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Deleted images could still appear in &#8216;random&#8217; image galleries (1129)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Galleries with only one page were causing pagination links to appear (1156)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Inability to change gallerypath on multisite networks (1150)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Overriding static resources (CSS &amp; JS) through files in wp-content/ngg/ was not working (1144)</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.6.0 &#8211; 02.10.2021</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Added new &#8216;Bulk actions&#8217; option to remove EXIF Orientation from existing images (1137)</li>
<li>NEW:     Allow maximum_entity_limit display setting regardless of source (1146)</li>
<li>NEW:     Provide hooks to customize Uppy settings (1139)</li>
<li>NEW:     Recreated legacy templates as modern &#8220;views&#8221; (1127)</li>
<li>Fixed:   A compatibility warning with NextGEN Plus would appear when users had NextGEN Starter (1097)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility issue with Topscorer Theme (344171)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with Custom Post Types UI (1076)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with jQuery.mmenu (1140)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Disable marketing additions for users with NextGEN Starter enabled</li>
<li>Fixed:   Error responses from the server when uploading images failed were not specific (1121)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Image rotation not reliable (1137)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Imagebrowser pagination broke on images with UTF8 characters in their title (1135)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Shortcodes displaying albums did not appear in the order listed (1128)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Transient tracker was calling update_option() on every page (1074)</li>
</ul>
<h4>v3.5.0 &#8211; 12.17.2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>Changed: Deprecated legacy template functionality</li>
<li>Changed: Deprecated built-in custom style / CSS mechanism</li>
<li>Fixed:   Misc updates for PHP 8.0 compatibility</li>
</ul>
<h4>v3.4.7 &#8211; 11.25.2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Replaced plupload with a new uppy.js based uploader for faster uploading</li>
<li>Changed: Updated select2 and Gritter to the latest versions</li>
<li>Changed: Several changes have been made for future jQuery 3.5 compatibility</li>
<li>Fixed:   Gutenberg Block and Featured Image features on wordpress.com hosting</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.3.20 &#8211; 10.13.2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     PHP 5.6 is the minimum supported PHP version</li>
<li>NEW:     WordPress 5.2 is the minimum support PHP version</li>
<li>Fixed:   Block disappearing in Block Editor</li>
<li>Fixed:   Gutenberg block and featured image features were broken on wordpress.com hosting</li>
<li>Note:    NextGEN Gallery will soon be licensed under GPLv3.</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.3.17.1 &#8211; 09.03.2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed:   Gutenberg block and featured image features were broken on wordpress.com hosting</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.3.17 &#8211; 08.18.2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed:   Override Thumbnail Settings not configurable</li>
<li>Fixed:   Broken gallery displays in WP 5.5 with Classic Editor</li>
<li>Fixed:   HTML in Gallery &amp; Image fields</li>
<li>Fixed:   Inability to save Gallery Settings or Other Options</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.3.11 &#8211; 08.14.2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed:   Fancybox lightbox not working with WordPress 5.5</li>
<li>Fixed:   Inability to upload images or create galleries in WordPress 5.5</li>
<li>Fixed:   Cannot crop images from Manage Galleries page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed use of jquery.size() and jquery.browser</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed iterator_to_array() PHP warning</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.3.10 &#8211; 08.12.2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Added filter &#8216;ngg_recent_images_sort_by_column&#8217; to control how recent images are sorted</li>
<li>Fixed:   Assigning a thumbnail to a custom post type page/post caused a fatal javsacript error</li>
<li>Fixed:   NextGEN would previously be completely unusable should it even once determine that it doesn&#8217;t have the necessary roles it needs</li>
<li>Fixed:   Several SimpleLightbox issues caused by a recent version upgrade</li>
<li>Changed: Admin user interface modifications</li>
<li>Changed: Misc code improvements to take advantage of PHP 5.3+ features</li>
<li>Changed: Removed NGG_FIX_JQUERY constant</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.3.6 &#8211; 06.24.2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Added a mechanism in Other Options &gt; Misc to update page featured images assigned with NextGen version 1 that were broken by a WordPress 5.4 API change</li>
<li>NEW:     Added two filters (ngg_default_settings and ngg_default_global_settings) to allow control over default settings for new networks, sites and sub-sites</li>
<li>NEW:     Updated SimpleLightbox to the latest version. This fixes all gallery images appearing in the lightbox if more than one gallery was on the page.</li>
<li>Fixed:   Album routing was broken if the albums were named using a non-latin alphabet</li>
<li>Fixed:   Gallery path validation was broken on some IIS servers</li>
<li>Fixed:   NextGen was unable to serve AJAX requests on home.pl hosting</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed the unused simple_html_dom module which was causing errors with PHP 7.3</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.3.5 &#8211; 04.09.2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed:   Broken dynamic images</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.3.2 &#8211; 04.07.2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed:   Gallery paths were calculated incorrectly on wordpress.com hosting</li>
<li>Fixed:   Insert Gallery Window could not edit an existing displayed gallery with a legacy template without breaking the displayed gallery</li>
<li>Fixed:   Manage Albums page could generate lengthy PHP warnings if galleries or other albums did not have a preview image assigned</li>
<li>Fixed:   NextGen was forcing the &#8216;screen_options_show_screen&#8217; filter to always be true</li>
<li>Fixed:   Plugin would not load and would throw an error due to C_Component_Registry not being found</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed last traces of javascript that were in display type templates</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.3.0 &#8211; 03.10.2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Added feature on Manage Galleries page to search gallery names</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filter &#8216;ngg_disable_shortcodes_in_request_api&#8217; to disable rendering of NextGen shortcodes in REST</li>
<li>NEW:     Added option to automatically watermark images during upload</li>
<li>Changed: Minimum PHP version supported is now 5.4</li>
<li>Changed: Pope framework now included via Composer</li>
<li>Changed: Removed use of &#8216;contextual_help&#8217; filter which is deprecated</li>
<li>Changed: Renamed nggallery.po to nggallery.pot for better compatibility with Loco Translate</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with Divi Booster</li>
<li>Fixed:   Copying images to another gallery caused a PHP warning</li>
<li>Fixed:   Featured Image feature was not working</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed PHP warning sometimes displayed with album breadcrumbs</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed PHP warning when displaying certain albums</li>
<li>Fixed:   No notification was given when moving or copying images on Manage Gallery</li>
<li>Fixed:   PHP warning would be displayed when MediaRSS feature was enabled</li>
<li>Fixed:   SimpleLightbox would not use image alttext attribute for titles</li>
<li>Fixed:   Uploading zip files containing images with uppercase file extensions would fail to extract any images</li>
<li>Fixed:   Uploading images with invalid EXIF would reject the image entirely</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.2.23 &#8211; 12.02.2019</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     There is a new setting under Other Options &gt; Misc to disable enqueueing FontAwesome entirely</li>
<li>Changed: WP-CLI commands have been namespaced and numerous new commands have been added</li>
<li>Fixed:   Add Gallery / Images page would instruct users to upload zip files even if the multisite settings disallowed it</li>
<li>Fixed:   Conflict with Elementor breaking the Attach-To-Post window styling</li>
<li>Fixed:   Corrected PHP warnings generated when creating the template &amp; static override directory (&#8216;ngg&#8217;) inside WP_CONTENT_DIR if write access isn&#8217;t available</li>
<li>Fixed:   Gallery slug generation was broken when the gallery name included special characters and broke those galleries as album children</li>
<li>Fixed:   Improved performance on Manage Galleries page by simplifying query to count images belonging to galleries</li>
<li>Fixed:   Manage Galleries could generate a PHP warning when listing galleries created by users that have since been deleted</li>
<li>Fixed:   Shutter Reloaded&#8217;s navigation icons were always missing</li>
<li>Fixed:   Slideshow widget was enqueueing a file that no exists</li>
<li>Fixed:   Two basic slideshow displays on one page would cause a JS error that broke their display</li>
<li>Fixed:   URL resolution for paginated galleries and dynamic thumbnails was broken if WordPress was in a sub-directory of a sub-directory install (split home &amp; site url)</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.2.21 &#8211; 11.20.2019</h4>

<li>Changed: Small branding and color update</li>
</ul>

<li>Changed: Dynamic thumbnails are generated in their own PHP processes/url</li>
<li>Fixed:   Distorted images and thumbnails</li>
<li>Fixed:   Timeout when viewing large galleries</li>
<li>Fixed:   Memory optimizations when generating images</li>
</ul>

</ul>
<h4>V3.2.8 &#8211; 07.16.2019</h4>

<li>Fixed:   &#8216;Scan folder for new images&#8217; did not assign a gallery preview image</li>

<li>Fixed:   Minor error emitted from common.js</li>
<li>Fixed:   Move Images / Copy Images now also moves/copies dynamically generated versions</li>
<li>Fixed:   The uninstall routine handler was generating a PHP warning accessing an undeclared variable</li>
<li>Fixed:   Zip uploads from some macOS users was failing</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.2.4 &#8211; 06.04.2019</h4>

<li>Fixed:   A PHP warning emitted on Gallery &gt; Other Options if the current gallery path cannot be written to</li>
<li>Fixed:   Added compatibility check for the official FontAwesome plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Clicking a checkbox in the Insert Gallery Window&#8217;s &#8220;Sort or exclude images&#8221; tab was not functioning</li>
<li>Fixed:   Resized images were becoming larger than the original in some circumstances</li>
<li>Fixed:   URL to static assets like JS and CSS files was incorrect when NextGen Gallery was a symlink</li>

<li>Changed: Added 185 character limit to filenames to prevent filesystem issues</li>
<li>Changed: Removed caching of &#8216;random&#8217; galleries; now only random widgets will be cached</li>
<li>Changed: Removed dependency on underscore.string.js</li>
<li>Changed: Updated base64.js library in attach-to-post module</li>
<li>Changed: Updated jquery.waitforimages.js</li>
<li>Fixed:   Uploading of non-JPEG images and uploading of JPEG with invalid EXIF data</li>

<li>Secured: Image attribute storage</li>
<li>Fixed:   Styling of upload notifications</li>
<li>Fixed:   Do not purge WPML tag/translation mapping when removing unused NGG tags</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don&#8217;t invoke icl_translate() when the admin language matches the default language</li>
<li>Fixed:   Importing Media Library images inside the IGW window</li>
<li>Fixed:   NGG &gt; Overview&#8217;s &#8220;Upgrade to Pro&#8221; links were still present when NGG Plus/Pro were active</li>
<li>Fixed:   Patched PEL to catch a possible exception caused by malformed IFD</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed unneeded wp_localize_script(&#8216;wp-color-picker&#8217;&#8230;)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Sorting galleries with over 1k images did not work past image 999</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.0.1 &#8211; 05.17.2018</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed:   Prevent caching of display_tab.js which can break the IGW</li>
</ul>
<h4>V3.0.0 &#8211; 05.16.2018</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Complete redesign of NextGEN Gallery backend interface</li>
<li>Changed: Image descriptions may now include  elements with src, alt, title, id, class, name, rel, and style</li>
<li>Changed: Upgraded Select2 to latest release (4.0.5)</li>
<li>Changed: Updated link href to &#8216;image delete&#8217; &amp; &#8216;recover&#8217; links</li>
<li>Fixed:   Gutenberg compatibility</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed use of screen_icon() from plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Color selection widget keeping unsaved values between page refreshes</li>
</ul>
<h4>V2.2.54 &#8211; 02.28.2018</h4>

<li>Changed: Now prevent maximum_entity_count from being set to 0 or lower in Other Options</li>

<li>Changed: Upgraded FontAwesome to 4.6.1</li>

<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with added WP role objects without a remove_cap() method</li>
<li>Fixed:   Default watermark setting causing images to be watermarked by text even though &#8220;image&#8221; is shown chosen on &#8220;Other Options&#8221;</li>

</ul>
<h4>V2.1.33 &#8211; 04.25.2016</h4>

<h4>V2.1.31 &#8211; 04.05.2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Added constant NGG_SCRIPT_VERSION that is either the plugin version or rand() should SCRIPT_DEBUG be on</li>
<li>NEW:     Added warning when saving galleries and refuse to automatically delete galleries with one or more &#8220;../&#8221; in their path.</li>
<li>Changed: ATP slug field disallow several characters (spaces, ?, |, &amp;, [, ]) by replacing them with dashes as they are typed</li>
<li>Changed: Made get_static_url() look in the WP_CONTENT/ngg/(module_name)/static directory for CSS/JS overrides</li>
<li>Fixed:   Bug introduced in 2.1.24 allowing gallery paths &amp; slugs to contain spaces; galleries must be &#8220;saved&#8221; once to correct them</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with WPML String Translation when uploading images without title or description</li>
<li>Fixed:   Made get_image_url() encode gallery directory names &#8216;because%this%is&#8217; a valid directory</li>
<li>Fixed:   Manage Galleries &gt; Search results not saving when edited</li>
<li>Fixed:   Provided imagebrowser legacy templates not using AJAX pagination when enabled</li>
<li>Fixed:   Resource manager breaking the layout of the Multisite Plugin Activation page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Static url generation when the nextgen-gallery directory is a symlink outside of the WordPress roots</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixed:    C_Router-&gt;initialize() generating warnings with WP-CLI or the WP-CLI-Cron</li>

<li>Fixed:    C_Gallery-&gt;validation() not working properly when sanitizing gallery title using UTF-8</li>
<li>Fixed:    NGG&#8217;s cross-frame-communication cookies not being purged</li>
<li>Fixed:    Updated C_Dynamic_Thumbnails_Manager-&gt;get_uri_from_params() with user-submitted patch</li>
<li>Fixed:    Updated C_CustomPost_DataMapper_Driver-&gt;_save_entity() with user-submitted patch</li>

<h4>V2.1.7 &#8211; 08.12.2015</h4>

<li>Changed: Made Add Gallery/Images notifications a link to the gallery</li>

<li>Changed: Updated widgets to use PHP5 parent::__construct() over $this-&gt;WP_Widget()</li>
<li>Fixed:   C_NextGen_Metadata-&gt;get_EXIF() was bugged with imagebrowser-exif template</li>
<li>Fixed:   Cornerstone/X compatibility with WordPress gallery plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Recovering images and photos was &#8216;generating&#8217; from backup instead of copying</li>
<li>Fixed:   Setting post thumbnail more than once on a page/post</li>
<li>Fixed:   Permanently hide display types from ATP without an active POPE module</li>
</ul>
<h4>V2.1.2 &#8211; 07.20.2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Ability to import from Media Library</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filter &#8216;ngg_datamapper_table_name&#8217;</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filter <code>ngg_legacy_template_directories</code> for legacy template locator (thanks Ross McKay)</li>
<li>NEW:     Pagination available on Manage Images page</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filter ngg_manage_images_items_per_page_array to control pagination options</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filters &#8216;ngg_load_frontend_logic&#8217; and &#8216;ngg_get_modules_to_load&#8217;</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filter &#8216;ngg_add_page_shortcode&#8217; to control Manage Galleries &gt; &#8216;Create new page&#8217; content</li>
<li>NEW:     Added filter &#8216;ngg_manage_albums_items_order&#8217;</li>
<li>Changed: Removed PHP4 support from WordPress gallery plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to set NextGEN Image as Featured Image</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don&#8217;t use resource manager in download requests for WP Photo Shelter</li>
<li>Fixed:   Updated custom jQuery-UI styling to resemble WordPress postbox styling</li>
<li>Fixed:   Styled plupload buttons to resemble WordPress buttons</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed &#8216;fixed&#8217; class from manage galleries table. Allows columns to adjust to content</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed note about flash support and fixed typoe (thanks Rene Wolf)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed typo in nggallery.po</li>
<li>Fixed:   Cache results of lookup_columns() to avoid multiple identical queries; thanks go to Alex Bradaric</li>
<li>Fixed:   Better WP-CPI detection</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed unnecessary calls to parent::initialize()</li>
<li>Fixed:   Adjusted album-compact template to always include p.ngg-album-gallery-image-counter</li>
<li>Fixed:   Replaced empty gallery rendering in is_feed() with a link</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed default settings for imagerotator, which is no longer supported</li>
<li>Fixed:   Optimized scanning of images when importing a photo gallery</li>
<li>Fixed:   When a photo gallery is deleted, ensure that DB and filesystem are purged</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed Insert Gallery Window box shadow</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that file_exists() calls are prefixed with @</li>
</ul>
<h4>V2.1.0 &#8211; 05.18.2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Album breadcrumbs and pagination</li>
<li>NEW:     Ability to override builtin MVC templates</li>
<li>NEW:     Robust transient management</li>
<li>NEW:     Added the ability to set post thumbnails via XML-RPC module</li>
<li>NEW:     Added &#8216;ngg_get_image_size_params&#8217; filter to control image generation</li>
<li>NEW:     Added &#8216;ngg_basic_tagcloud_title&#8217; and &#8216;ngg_basic_tagcloud_excluded_display_types&#8217; filters</li>
<li>NEW:     Added ngg_manage_images_items_per_page filter</li>
<li>NEW:     Added &#8220;ngg_get_image_url&#8221; filter</li>
<li>NEW:     Including Ukranian and Polish translations</li>
<li>NEW:     The ability to set template in widgets</li>
<li>Changed: Default thumbnail dimensions set to 240&#215;160</li>
<li>Changed: Product now adheres to Pope 0.12 and provides get_modules_to_load()</li>
<li>Changed: Updated gallery plugin translations</li>
<li>Changed: Removed link to capsman plugin in Roles accordion</li>
<li>Changed: Taxnomies now use internationalized strings</li>
<li>Changed: Image date/time meta data fields are stored as UNIX timestamps</li>
<li>Secured: Uploading zips</li>
<li>Fixed:   Various PHP warnings and notices in WordPress gallery plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility fixes for WPML</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that backup image functionality fails gracefully</li>
<li>Fixed:   WP option &#8216;ngg_do_upgrade&#8217; updated in every HTTP request</li>
<li>Fixed;   Empty $_SERVER[&#8216;PATHINFO&#8217;] causing multiple routing issues</li>
<li>Fixed:   &#8220;Manage Galleries&#8221; display image alttext in the filename column</li>
<li>Fixed:   Various issues with the tag cloud display type</li>
<li>Fixed:   Integrity check when updating from 1.9.x</li>
<li>Fixed:   Image filenames substituting spaces for + which is only proper in the query string</li>
<li>Fixed:   Insert Gallery Window not working with nested levels of gzip compression</li>
<li>Fixed:   Imagebrowser as lightbox effect not working with pagination</li>
<li>Fixed:   Plugin compatibility with MultiVerso Advanced File Sharing</li>
<li>Fixed:   &#8220;Add page&#8221; button not displaying on the next immediate page load</li>
<li>Fixed:   Double-escaping of non-latin characters</li>
<li>Fixed:   Imagebrowser pagination with custom templates</li>
<li>Fixed:   Custom CSS is enqueued late to ensure it&#8217;s one of the last stylesheets loaded</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed watermarking PNG images and photos</li>
<li>Fixed:   Using the &#8220;Import Metadata&#8221; bulk action overwrites existing data</li>
<li>Fixed:   Seconds were not retained from CaptureTime EXIF field</li>
<li>Fixed:   Conflicts created by our TinyMCE plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Image mapper setting gid to gallery name, not the unique ID</li>
<li>Fixed:   Restored nggdb-&gt;get_random_images(), nggdb-&gt;search_for_file, and nggdb-&gt;find_all_albums()</li>
<li>Fixed:   Allow gallery slug as parameter to nggdb::get_gallery()</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don&#8217;t minify Plupload&#8217;s i18n JavaScript</li>
<li>Fixed:   Custom template images not being given their full effect code attributes</li>
<li>Fixed:   When importing galleries from folders, allow symlinks</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use of C_Gallery_Mapper in C_Image_Wrapper</li>
<li>Fixed:   Properly handle themes that don&#8217;t call wp_footer() or wp_print_footer_scripts()</li>
<li>Fixed:   Warning about missing style.php file on Network Admin -&gt; Gallery page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Warning about getimagesize() failure when backing up an image</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.71 &#8211; 02.19.2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Module files are compiled into a single package file to reduce disk I/O</li>
<li>NEW:     All CSS stylesheets and Javascript source files are minified to reduce latency</li>
<li>NEW:     All lightboxes are configured using an in-memory management class.</li>
<li>NEW:     Uses Pope 2.0, benefiting from the new caching capabilities</li>
<li>NEW:     NextGEN Gallery&#8217;s functionality is disabled if NextGEN Pro is incompatible</li>
<li>NEW:     Added ngg_effect_code filter</li>
<li>Changed: Updated WordPress gallery plugin&#8217;s FontAwesome to 4.3.0</li>
<li>Changed: Updated WordPress gallery plugin&#8217;s  select2 to 3.5.2</li>
<li>Changed: Removed PicLens / CoolIris integration from WordPress gallery plugin</li>
<li>Changed: Removed JSON API. Please use XML-RPC API instead</li>
<li>Changed: For performance reasons, we cache FS &amp; url lookups/calculations</li>
<li>Changed: Greatly reduced the # of sql queries, and eliminated anything redundant</li>
<li>Changed: For performance reasons, we cache datamapper and SQL queries</li>
<li>Changed: Don&#8217;t enqueue scripts or styles unless we require them</li>
<li>Changed: Reduce the number of resources we enqueue for every HTTP request</li>
<li>Changed: Ngg_Store now uses cookies instead of localStorage</li>
<li>Changed: Insert Gallery Window is routed using wp-admin/admin_init</li>
<li>Changed: Removed unused code from ngglegacy module. Created wrappers for commonly-used functions</li>
<li>Changed: LZW module removed</li>
<li>Changed: Legacy template drop-down selection now using select2</li>
<li>Secured: Restrict folder browsing to NGG_IMPORT_ROOT constant</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility issue with PHP&#8217;s transparent ZLIB compression</li>
<li>Fixed:   Imagebrowser as lightbox effect not working when non-default permalink slug used</li>
<li>Fixed:   Angled quotations marks used in shortcode parameters</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility between ImageBrowser display type and TwentyFifteen theme</li>
<li>Fixed:   Allow pagination to retain query string url parameters when linking to other pages</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed pagination issues with slideshow galleries displayed as thumbnails</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fix C_GalleryStorage_Driver_Base-&gt;import_gallery_from_fs() not checking imgBackup</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed problem with default settings being applied multiple times</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fallback to &#8220;full&#8221; image sizes if &#8220;backup&#8221; images aren&#8217;t available</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use M_DataMapper&#8217;s serialization methods throughout the codebase</li>
<li>Fixed:   Conflict with WordPress SEO and get_the_excerpt() call</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don&#8217;t run Resource Manager on wp-login.php or wp-sign.php</li>
<li>Fixed:   TinyMCE Image Editor conflict with Insert Gallery Window placeholder images</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fix Shutter positioning when admin bar is displayed</li>
<li>Fixed:   Allow deselection of a WordPress gallery plugin legacy template</li>
<li>Fixed:   Prevent conflicts when using imagebrowser as a lightbox effect</li>
<li>Fixed:   Pagination not working for slideshow galleries using thumbnail integration</li>
</ul>

<li>Changed: Gallery widgets now apply height:auto to their element; fixes compatibility with some themes</li>
<li>Changed: Random galleries should be substantially faster now (1000% or more for large image tables)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Complete WPML compatibility</li>

<li>Fixed:   WP Cron job will remove not only displayed gallery transients, but rendering transients as well</li>
<li>Fixed:   NGG_RENDERING_CACHE_TTL constant is honored properly</li>
<li>Fixed:   If using the caption template for Basic Thumbnails, only show the image caption when appropriate</li>
<li>Fixed:   If NGG is uninstalled, so are it&#8217;s custom capabilities</li>
<li>Fixed:   Translate &#8220;Attach NextGEN Gallery to Post&#8221; ATP icon alt text when translations are active</li>
<li>Fixed:   Multisite gallery path tooltip gave a wrong default setting</li>
<li>Fixed:   Flush &#8216;all&#8217; caches when pope_module_list setting changes</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don&#8217;t enqueue related images css in the admin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Basic slideshow galleries fixes WP creating extraneous P element above the slideshow display</li>
<li>Fixed:   Basic Singlepic will now display images marked &#8216;excluded&#8217; in the admin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Admin pages can now update when the &#8220;Save&#8221; button text has been translated</li>
</ul>

<h4>V2.0.57 &#8211; 03.05.2014</h4>
<ul>

<li>NEW:     Tooltip added for Page Link to functionality</li>
<li>NEW:     Displayed Gallery Triggers moved from NextGEN Pro to NextGEN Gallery (not in use)</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_Store, a client-side persistence layer (not in use)</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_CRON_SCHEDULE constant. Set to the number of seconds between the execution of NextGEN Gallery cron jobs</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_RENDERING_CACHE_TTL constant. TTL measured in seconds.</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_DISPLAYED_GALLERY_CACHE_TTL constant. TTL measured in seconds.</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_DISABLE_LEGACY_SHORTCODES constant. When TRUE, [slideshow] becomes [nggslideshow].</li>
<li>NEW:     Added Font Awesome, available for NextGEN Gallery extensions</li>
<li>Changed: Transients are removed every 30 minutes instead of 60 minutes</li>
<li>Changed: Admin Page &amp; Form components refactored to allow custom POST processing</li>
<li>Changed: Default path for NEW multisite installations to wp-content/uploads/sites/%BLOG_ID%/nggallery/</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to upload ZIP files on Windows hosts</li>
<li>Fixed:   Support for filenames with non-ASCII characters</li>
<li>Fixed:   Dynamic updates in the Insert Gallery interface (interframe communication)</li>
<li>Fixed:   WordPress gallery plugin insert interface freezing in IE11</li>
<li>Fixed:   Path issues on Windows Servers</li>
<li>Fixed:   Module installer integrity</li>
<li>Fixed:   Database query performance. No more joins to the WP options table</li>
<li>Fixed:   Lightboxes storing absolute paths for static resources</li>
<li>Fixed:   Displayed gallery cache not regularly flushed</li>
<li>Fixed:   SQL query performance problems. Honor max_packet_allowed variable for MySQL</li>
<li>Fixed:   Multiple database queries generated for determining next available image slug</li>
<li>Fixed:   Corrupted MediaRSS feeds</li>
<li>Fixed:   Padding on Gallery Settings and Other Options pages</li>
<li>Fixed:   Routing issues on subdirectory installs</li>
<li>Fixed:   Importing galleries using the Insert Gallery Interface</li>
<li>Fixed:   Gallery path calculations on Windows web servers</li>
<li>Fixed:   Sub-album urls not processed correctly</li>
<li>Fixed:   Apply maximum entity count to existing displayed galleries</li>
<li>Fixed:   NextGEN Gallery Thumbnail Widget shouldn&#8217;t use ImageBrowser effect</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to set shuffle parameter for ImageRotator slideshow galleries</li>
<li>Fixed:   PHP warning about HTMLDocument when displaying a SinglePic</li>
<li>Fixed:   Sanitization of gallery title</li>
<li>Fixed:   Home URL now used instead of Site URL in MediaRSS feed</li>
<li>Fixed:   Insert Gallery interface broken when WPML is installed</li>
<li>Fixed:   Insert Gallery interface instructing browser to cache the page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Watermarking not working in low-memory environments</li>
<li>Fixed:   Maximum images limit not being applied for galleries already created.</li>
<li>Fixed:   Double forward slashes in static urls</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don&#8217;t sleep when checking if the installer is running</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don&#8217;t enforce Pope interface contracts</li>
<li>Fixed:   Remove custom table extra records from wp_options table</li>
<li>Fixed:   Scan folder for new images and photos not working</li>
<li>Fixed:   Incorrect page permalink used for &#8220;Page Link To&#8221; functionality</li>
<li>Fixed:   Pagination broken when Basic Thumbnail gallery on the same page as Basic Album</li>
<li>Fixed:   parse_url() warnings generated for PHP 5.3.3 and earlier</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with Headway Themes</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with web servers which don&#8217;t provide PHP a document root</li>
<li>Fixed:   Third-party incompatibilities caused by the Photocrati Resource Manager</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with the Flattr plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with the Weaver II theme</li>
<li>Fixed:   Gallery plugin interface tweaks for WordPress 3.8</li>
</ul>
<h4>V2.0.40 &#8211; 11.26.2013</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Added the ability to apply lightbox effects to non-NGG images</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_HIDE_STRICT_ERRORS constant. Define and set to TRUE to hide strict errors</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NEXTGEN_GALLERY_IMPORT_ROOT constant. Define and set to TRUE to browse from a custom directory</li>
<li>NEW:     Added NGG_DEBUG constant. Define and set to TRUE to display helpful messages for debugging</li>
<li>NEW:     Each custom table record will have an associated custom post record for expansion</li>
<li>NEW:     Display helpful error messages when there&#8217;s a problem uploading images and photos</li>
<li>NEW:     Add data-(src|thumbnail|image-id|title|description) attribute to gallery image anchors</li>
<li>NEW:     Variant support for displayed gallery sources. Random images is limited to 5 variations</li>
<li>Fixed:   Excessive creation of transients for random galleries</li>
<li>Fixed:   Issues prohibiting the ability to upload images and photos</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with NextGEN Gallery Export Plugin for Adobe Lightroom (thanks Vladimir!)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Sorting in the Insert Gallery interface</li>
<li>Fixed:   HTML allowed in gallery/album descriptions</li>
<li>Fixed:   Requests for galleries within albums that have numeric names are broken</li>
<li>Fixed:   Call to a non-member function get() on WP_Query</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to sort by Image ID in the Insert Gallery interface</li>
<li>Fixed:   Isolate the Insert Gallery Window from implicit third-party script inclusion</li>
<li>Fixed:   Check for the existance of thumbnails when generating urls, and if missing, generate new ones</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with NextGEN Facebook OpenGraph+ plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Various XML-RPC issues in WordPress gallery plugin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Widgets stylesheet not included</li>
<li>Fixed:   Issue with color not being pre-selected when previewing Watermark</li>
<li>Fixed:   E_NOTICE emitted when cleaning up cached image files</li>
<li>Fixed:   E_NOTICE emitted when viewing display type settings</li>
<li>Fixed:   Typo adjusting pcre.backtrack_limit for shortcodes</li>
<li>Fixed:   Content within the tabs of the Insert Gallery interface cut-off</li>
<li>Fixed:   Routing problem which would cause conflicts with different display types on the same page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Broken Dynamic CSS links on GoDaddy</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to use HTML in gallery/album descriptions</li>
<li>Fixed:   Sub-album requests conflicting with paginated galleries on the same page</li>
<li>Merged:  Pull request from andreasE (https://bitbucket.org/photocrati/nextgen-gallery/pull-request/6/)</li>
</ul>
<h4>V2.0.33 &#8211; 10.21.2013</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Requests /ngg_tag/[tagname] will create a displayed gallery</li>
<li>NEW:     Option added to &#8220;Import Gallery&#8221; tab to use original images</li>
<li>Fixed:   Links are broken on the ngg_tags-sitemap.xml file by WordPress SEO</li>
<li>Fixed:   PHP notice: Attempt to assign property of non-object</li>
<li>Fixed:   Undefined property warnings when using NextGEN Basic Thumbnails</li>
<li>Fixed:   Detect if an applying a transient to a displayed gallery was successful</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility issues with BJ-Lazy-Load and Colorbox</li>
<li>Fixed:   Pagination conflicts for multiple Imagebrowsers on the same page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ability to display previous exception with debug mode</li>
<li>Fixed:   Tagclouds not working in multisite instances</li>
<li>Fixed:   Load widgets.css when a widget is being used</li>
<li>Fixed:   Installer should remove all instances of the component factory</li>
<li>Fixed:   WordPress gallery plugin widget settings interface not intuitive</li>
<li>Fixed:   Inability to upload images and photos in some Windows host environments</li>
<li>Fixed:   Sorting images/galleries using the Insert Gallery interface</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fix detection of HTTPS (pull request by Leonhardt Wille)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compilation errors of regular expressions</li>
<li>Fixed:   Pro galleries wouldn&#8217;t display in environments using PHP 5.3.3 or less</li>
<li>Fixed:   Scanning of router slug is now limited to the uri, not the url</li>
<li>Fixed:   Show slideshow link isn&#8217;t required for thumbnail/imagebrowser integration</li>
<li>Fixed:   WordPress media-upload with &#8216;singlepic&#8217; image size</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use target=_blank when the link setting is provided for NextGEN Basic Singlepic</li>
<li>Fixed:   Only display rendering errors if WP_DEBUG is enabled</li>
</ul>
<h4>V2.0.31 &#8211; 10.03.2013</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Restored AJAX pagination for NextGEN Basic ImageBrowser display type</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with WordPress Local SEO by Yoast</li>
<li>Fixed:   Inability to upload images if image_slug field was missing in database</li>
<li>Fixed:   Integration of NextGEN Basic Thumbnail and NextGEN Basic Slideshow display types</li>
<li>Fixed:   Photocrati Resource Manager further adjusted to be third-party friendly</li>
<li>Fixed:   Added the ability to find legacy templates in both the child/parent theme directories</li>
<li>Fixed:   JavaScript errors in Attach to Post interface</li>
<li>Fixed:   Router can handle port numbers in urls</li>
<li>Fixed:   Carousel template was linking to NextGEN Basic ImageBrowser view</li>
<li>Fixed:   SQL query generated for displayed galleries using tags as source</li>
<li>Fixed:   3rd party compat: raise &amp; never lower pcre.backtrack_limit</li>
</ul>
<h4>V2.0.30 &#8211; 09.25.2013</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Restored the ability to use imagebrowser display type instead of a lightbox effect</li>
<li>Changed: Displayed galleries are no longer rendered in RSS feeds</li>
<li>Changed: Removed &#8220;Plugin Check&#8221; widget from WordPress gallery plugin overview page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Silence PHP warnings/errors in an output buffer for AJAX actions</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility issue with WordPress SEO and broken site maps (and large error_logs)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility issue with AJAX Event Calendar (and possibly others)</li>
<li>Fixed:   Adjusted Photocrati Resource Manager to be third-party friendly</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed empty result set for displayed galleries selecting &#8216;All&#8217; tags</li>
<li>Fixed:   URL generation for imagebrowser pagination links</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that image meta is imported on creation</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that transients are removed when an external object cache is used</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don&#8217;t load pluggable.php. This will fix plugin conflicts</li>
<li>Fixed:   In Insert Gallery interface, galleries created in one tab weren&#8217;t showing in another</li>
<li>Fixed:   Don&#8217;t output frame events cookie for XML-RPC requests</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixed:   Ensure that sub-albums display correctly when the word &#8220;album&#8221; is part of a slug</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that sub-albums display correctly when numerical slugs are used</li>
<li>Fixed:   Related images heading only added when Related Images functionality is enabled</li>
<li>Fixed:   PHP Warning about undefined index when viewing basic albums</li>
<li>Fixed:   AJAX handling is third-party compatible</li>
<li>Fixed:   Image date is no longer overwritten when an image is modified</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed issue with displayed galleries using source=&#8217;tags&#8217;</li>
<li>Fixed:   Problem with transient cache not getting flushed properly from Other Options page</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use correct gallery/transient ID when ajax pagination is used</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixed:   Related images functionality works as it did in 1.9.x</li>

<li>Fixed:   Click-to-advance slideshow behavior for slideshow galleries</li>

<h4>V2.0.11 &#8211; 08.19.2013</h4>

<li>NEW:     Added &#8220;run_ngg_resource_manager&#8221; hook to by-pass our resource manager</li>
<li>Changed: Removed &#8220;Reset &amp; Uninstall&#8221; tab, for now</li>
<li>Fixed:   Compatibility with W3 Total Cache. Please flush cache after updating.</li>
<li>Fixed:   Conflicts with Photocrati Theme Galleries</li>
<li>Fixed:   Blank Insert Gallery interface window</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed ability to change Lightbox Effect settings</li>
<li>Fixed:   Implemented techniques to ensure WP_Query variables aren&#8217;t overwritten</li>
<li>Fixed:   Enqueuing AJAX JS libraries twice in wp-admin</li>
<li>Fixed:   Encoding issues</li>
<li>Fixed:   PHP warnings caused by accessing unserialized data as array</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fixed WordPress gallery plugin installer issues</li>
</ul>
<h4>V2.0.7 &#8211; 08.09.2013</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     New resource manager that fixes many plugin and theme incompatibilities</li>
<li>NEW:     Styles (custom stylesheets) should reside in wp-content/ngg_styles</li>
<li>NEW:     Added option to &#8220;Other Options -&gt; Misc&#8221; to control maximum images returned</li>
<li>Secured: Removed default connector for jQuery FileTree library</li>
<li>Changed: Updated the simplehtmldom library to version 1.5</li>
<li>Changed: jQuery is now enqueued at the beginning of every request</li>
<li>Fixed:   Incompatibilities with BuddyPress</li>
<li>Fixed:   Incompatibilities with Events+, bbPress, Custom Permalinks, and many other plugins</li>
<li>Fixed:   Incompcatibilities with Member Access, AMember, Magic Fields, and More Fields</li>
<li>Fixed:   Incompatibilities with Elegant Themes, Oxygen, Responsive, and many other themes</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that gallery images don&#8217;t have a border by default</li>
<li>Fixed:   Conflict between imagebrowser and album urls</li>
<li>Fixed:   Reverted default gallerypath to wp-content/gallery/</li>
<li>Fixed:   Upgrade-safe way of overriding Styles</li>
<li>Fixed:   Generation of AJAX url is now based on slug</li>
<li>Fixed:   Restore nggShowGallery and nggShowSlideshow as wrappers to new API</li>
<li>Fixed:   Always use domain as specified by WordPress Site URL</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use WordPress Home URL over Site URL when appropriate</li>
<li>Fixed:   Numerous WordPress gallery plugin pagination issues</li>
<li>Fixed:   Adjusted our forms to comply with WordPress Firewalls</li>
<li>Fixed:   Correct use of select2 DOM selector for maximum compatibility</li>
<li>Fixed:   Path and URL calculations for Windows and UNIX environments</li>
<li>Fixed:   Ensure that pluggable.php is loaded at the start of every request</li>
<li>Fixed:   Fancybox: adjust CSS for further box-sizing protection from themes</li>
<li>Fixed:   Use PHP 5.2.1 compatible named pattern matching syntax</li>
<li>Fixed:   Remove usage of <strong>DIR</strong> constant not supported by PHP 5.2.x</li>
<li>Fixed:   Removed dependency on mb_string PHP module</li>
<li>Fixed:   Allow &#8220;No Lightbox&#8221; as an option for Lightbox Effects</li>
<li>Fixed:   Warning: &#8220;Invalid CRT parameters detected&#8221; for Windows environments</li>
</ul>
<h4>V2.0 &#8211; 07.30.2013</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW:     Improved user experience throughout the plugin, settings and usage.</li>
<li>NEW:     Plupload queue uploader that allows for bulk and zip uploads within the same interface.</li>
<li>NEW:     Complete redesign of the NextGEN options panel</li>
<li>NEW:     Added new interface for adding galleries from pages and posts.</li>
<li>NEW:     Galleries are now mobile friendly and responsive, which is most noticeable with a responsive theme.</li>
<li>NEW:     Streamlined functionality for displaying galleries based on tags.</li>
<li>NEW:     Architecture based on Pope Framework (http://bitbucket.org/photocrati/pope-framework)</li>
<li>NEW:     New shortcode, “ngg_images”, and corresponding Insert Gallery interface</li>
<li>NEW:     Galleries have now global and instance settings</li>
<li>NEW:     Support for FastCGI environments</li>
<li>Changed: Replaces shortcodes with placeholder images, however still supports legacy shortcodes.</li>
<li>Changed: Introduced new Growl-like notifications for WordPress gallery plugin</li>
<li>Changed: The container and its images are centered for photo slideshow galleries</li>
<li>Changed: NextGEN styles now override vs replace default styles</li>
<li>Changed: NextGEN legacy templates have been deprecated (but still function)</li>
<li>FIXED:   The ability to use NextGEN image as a Featured Image.</li>
<li>FIXED:   Misc PHP warnings, errors, in gallery plugin</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixed:   Removed mention of upgrade.php, which no longer exists</li>

<h4>V1.7.0 &#8211; 11.12.2010</h4>
<ul>

<li>Changed : Call TinyMCE window via admin-ajax</li>
<li>Bugfix : Better support for SSL blogs</li>
<li>Bugfix : Install/Upgrade failed when table prefix contain captial letters</li>
<li>Bugfix : Fix validation issues in Media-RSS</li>
<li>Bugfix : Empty tags in XMP Meta causes PHP error</li>
<li>Bugfix : Rework load mechanism for slideshow</li>
<li>Bugfix : Copy meta data when image is copied</li>
<li>Bugfix : Icon Support for Ozh&#8217; Admin Drop Down Menu</li>
<li>Bugfix : Use correct sort order in slideshow galleries</li>
</ul>
<h4>V1.6.2 &#8211; 19.09.2010</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW : Added constant NGG_SKIP_LOAD_SCRIPTS to avoid script load</li>
<li>Bugfix : Load Tags library with core files</li>
<li>Bugfix : Slideshow script failed in IE7, load script now in header</li>
<li>Bugfix : Load slideshow gallery widget always</li>
<li>Changed : New admin notice for database upgrade</li>
<li>Changed : Rework crop feature of WordPress gallery plugin for featured images</li>
<li>Changed : Use site_url() instead get_option (&#8216;siteurl&#8217;), required for SSL support</li>
</ul>
<h4>V1.6.1 &#8211; 08.09.2010</h4>
<ul>
<li>Bugfix : Script load of swfobject.js failed</li>
<li>Bugfix : Show sideshow also with 1 or 2 images</li>
<li>Bugfix : Rework null byte check in zip upload</li>
</ul>
<h4>V1.6.0 &#8211; 07.09.2010</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW : WordPress 3.0 Network (Multi-Site) support</li>
<li>NEW : Integrate jQuery Cycle as NON-Flash slideshow</li>
<li>NEW : Adding jQuery File Tree for import folder (THX to Sergey Pasyuk )</li>
<li>NEW : Added action hook &#8216;ngg_show_imagebrowser_first&#8217; on custom request</li>
<li>NEW : Added filter hook &#8216;ngg_slideshow_size&#8217; to resize sildeshow for mobile browser plugins</li>
<li>Changed : Reorder tabs for upload</li>
<li>Changed : New menu icon and screen icon (THX to Ben Dunkle)</li>
<li>Changed : Load frontend libs always</li>
<li>Changed : Rework of WordPress gallery plugin overview page</li>
<li>Bugfix : Security bugfix for Zip-Upload (THX to Dominic Szablewski)</li>
<li>Bugfix : Allow JPG, PNG, GIF extension</li>
<li>Bugfix : New German translation (THX to Martin Kramarz)</li>
<li>Bugfix : Copy/Move also backup file</li>
<li>Bugfix : Calculate correct ratio for fix thumbnail size (THX to Alekz Keck)</li>
</ul>
<h4>V1.5.5 &#8211; 14.06.2010</h4>
<ul>
<li>Bugfix : Compat issue for post thumbnails with WP2.9</li>
<li>NEW : Adding more hooks for custom fields plugin</li>
</ul>
<h4>V1.5.4 &#8211; 14.06.2010</h4>
<ul>
<li>Bugfix : No resize of smaller images or photos</li>
<li>Bugfix : Compat issues for Post Thumbnails under WP3.0</li>
<li>Bugfix : Esc_URL in Media RSS</li>
</ul>
<h4>V1.5.3 &#8211; 11.04.2010</h4>
<ul>
<li>New : Adding pagination to footer</li>
<li>Changed : Prepare new filter to replace slideshow galleries</li>
<li>Bugfix : Remove non-breaking space from navigation</li>
<li>Bugfix : Pagination of galleries</li>
<li>Bugfix : Fixed brackets position for old shortcode query</li>
<li>Bugfix : Slideshow option &#8216;Show next image on click&#8221; has wrong default value</li>
</ul>
<h4>V1.5.2 &#8211; 25.03.2010</h4>
<ul>
<li>Bugfix : XSS security vulnerability (THX to Core Security Advisories Team , Pedro Varangot)</li>
<li>Bugfix : Missing $wpdb in shortcodes.php</li>
</ul>
<h4>V1.5.1 &#8211; 23.03.2010</h4>
<ul>
<li>Bugfix : PHP4 compat issue for Add gallery &amp; options page</li>
<li>Bugfix : Gallery widget can now have a empty title</li>
<li>Bugfix : Adding correct stripslash for gallery title</li>
</ul>
<h4>V1.5.0 &#8211; 18.03.2010</h4>
<ul>
<li>NEW : Support for Post thumbnail feature</li>
<li>NEW : Backup and Recover function for images (THX to Simone Fumagalli)</li>
<li>NEW : Resize images after upload (THX to Simone Fumagalli)</li>
<li>NEW : Added a JSON class for fetching galleries in a RESTful way (see xml/json.php)</li>
<li>NEW : Adding various new capabilities for user roles</li>
<li>NEW : Auto downloader for translation file</li>
<li>Changed : Rename query var from slideshow to callback for compat reason with other plugin</li>
<li>Changed : Convert WordPress gallery plugin widget function to new WP structure</li>
<li>Changed : Include lookup for tags into the backend search</li>
<li>Changed : Restructure addgallery and settings page to enable custom tabs</li>
<li>Bugfix : Select album preview from gallery preview pics instead random list</li>
<li>Bugfix : Keep fix dimension in edit thumbnail operation</li>
<li>Bugfix : Import meta data didn&#8217;t work correct for existing images</li>
<li>Bugfix : Fix onload bug for Chrome 4 in Shutter script</li>
<li>Bugfix : Remove various PHP notices for a better world</li>
<li>Removed : Canonical link is now part of WordPress 2.9</li>
</ul>
